text: Onon, ki ʙa notavoni kasida suda ʙadand, ʙa kasone, ki gardankasi mekardand, megujand: «[Cunin nest] ʙalki najrangi saʙu ruz [-i sumo saʙaʙ sud, ki az hidojat ʙozmonem] ongoh, ki ʙa mo dastur medoded, ʙa Alloh taolo kofir savem va ʙarojas [dar qudrat va parastis] hamtojone qaror dihem». Onon hangome ki azoʙ [-i ilohi]-ro meʙinand, pusajmonii xudro [dar dil] pinhon mekunand va Mo ƣulu zancirhoro dar gardani onone, ki kufr varzidaand, meandozem. Ojo cuz [ʙa kajfari] on ci mekardand, mucozot mesavand
